name: SillyBilly
0:
”Alexa, open silly billy”
”Alexa, start silly billy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: silly billy
des:
Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson. 
Silly Billy is an Urban Cat, dismissed as too silly, everybody complains of an endless chatter they can hear in their minds, the 'silly talk' coming apparently fom silly billy's mind, but Billy disagrees, he finds other possible sources, like the wind or the phone, listen on to find out how he resolves the silly talk and the stink from Smelly Cat.
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
